content: quote: By TOM McELROY, Associated Press Writer Tom Mcelroy, Associated Press Writer Excerpt; NEW YORK – The FBI arrested four men Wednesday in what authorities called a plot to detonate a bomb outside a Jewish temple and to shoot military planes with guided missiles. Officials told The Associated Press the arrests came after a long-running undercover operation that began in Newburgh, N.Y., about 70 miles north of New York City. James Cromitie, David Williams, Onta Williams and Laguerre Payen, all of Newburgh, were charged with conspiracy to use weapons of mass destruction within the United States and conspiracy to acquire and use anti-aircraft missiles, the U.S. attorney's office said. The men had planned to detonate a car with plastic explosives outside a temple in the Bronx neighborhood of Riverdale and to shoot military planes at the New York Air National Guard base at Stewart Airport in Newburgh with Stinger surface-to-air guided missiles, authorities said. The defendants planned to "destroy a synagogue and a Jewish community center with C-4 plastic explosives," Acting U.S. Attorney Lev L. Dassin said. The religious targets were the Riverdale Temple, founded in 1947, and the Riverdale Jewish Center, authorities said. more at (*http://news.yahoo.com/s/ap/20090521/ap_on_re_us/us_temple_plot*)
quote: By TOM McELROY, Associated Press Writer Tom Mcelroy, Associated Press Writer Excerpt; NEW YORK – The FBI arrested four men Wednesday in what authorities called a plot to detonate a bomb outside a Jewish temple and to shoot military planes with guided missiles. title: APNewsBreak: 4 arrested in plot to bomb NYC temple

content: This is a BS case, although I'm not complaining that they were locked up. Lock up anyone who is ready to bomb a temple or shoot down a plane. But it's bravo Sierra in the sense that, these guys might have never got beyond the talking stage except that the police stepped in and provided them with the "bombs," and provided them with the "stinger" missle. Who knows how much "convincing" they needed in order to actually do this? As this case moves through the Court system we shall find out more, but just like the Florida case, these guys had no connection with any real terrorists. Will the evidence show that they were basically recruited by the Police? We shall see. But so far the Florida case hasn't resulted in any convictions. Dave

title: APNewsBreak: 4 arrested in plot to bomb NYC temple

content: quote: By TOM McELROY, Associated Press Writer Tom Mcelroy, Associated Press Writer Excerpt; NEW YORK – The FBI arrested four men Wednesday in what authorities called a plot to detonate a bomb outside a Jewish temple and to shoot military planes with guided missiles. Officials told The Associated Press the arrests came after a long-running undercover operation that began in Newburgh, N.Y., about 70 miles north of New York City. James Cromitie, David Williams, Onta Williams and Laguerre Payen, all of Newburgh, were charged with conspiracy to use weapons of mass destruction within the United States and conspiracy to acquire and use anti-aircraft missiles, the U.S. attorney's office said. The men had planned to detonate a car with plastic explosives outside a temple in the Bronx neighborhood of Riverdale and to shoot military planes at the New York Air National Guard base at Stewart Airport in Newburgh with Stinger surface-to-air guided missiles, authorities said. The defendants planned to "destroy a synagogue and a Jewish community center with C-4 plastic explosives," Acting U.S. Attorney Lev L. Dassin said. The religious targets were the Riverdale Temple, founded in 1947, and the Riverdale Jewish Center, authorities said. more at (*http://news.yahoo.com/s/ap/20090521/ap_on_re_us/us_temple_plot*)
quote: By TOM McELROY, Associated Press Writer Tom Mcelroy, Associated Press Writer Excerpt; NEW YORK – The FBI arrested four men Wednesday in what authorities called a plot to detonate a bomb outside a Jewish temple and to shoot military planes with guided missiles. Officials told The Associated Press the arrests came after a long-running undercover operation that began in Newburgh, N.Y., about 70 miles north of New York City. James Cromitie, David Williams, Onta Williams and Laguerre Payen, all of Newburgh, were charged with conspiracy to use weapons of mass destruction within the United States and conspiracy to acquire and use anti-aircraft missiles, the U.S. attorney's office said. The men had planned to detonate a car with plastic explosives outside a temple in the Bronx neighborhood of Riverdale and to shoot military planes at the New York Air National Guard base at Stewart Airport in Newburgh with Stinger surface-to-air guided missiles, authorities said. The defendants planned to "destroy a synagogue and a Jewish community center with C-4 plastic explosives," Acting U.S. Attorney Lev L. Dassin said. The religious targets were the Riverdale Temple, founded in 1947, and the Riverdale Jewish Center, authorities said. more at (*http://news.yahoo.com/s/ap/20090521/ap_on_re_us/us_temple_plot*)

content: This is a BS case, although I'm not complaining that they were locked up. Lock up anyone who is ready to bomb a temple or shoot down a plane. But it's bravo Sierra in the sense that, these guys might have never got beyond the talking stage except that the police stepped in and provided them with the "bombs," and provided them with the "stinger" missle. Who knows how much "convincing" they needed in order to actually do this? As this case moves through the Court system we shall find out more, but just like the Florida case, these guys had no connection with any real terrorists. Will the evidence show that they were basically recruited by the Police? We shall see. But so far the Florida case hasn't resulted in any convictions. Dave When did it become BS to attempt to buy illegal items from undercover agents? I guess the FBI were acting in an un-fair manner. Lets free them then. I'm sure they wouldn't have commited any violence if the FBI hadn't gotten involved. As a matter of fact lets level the playing field a bit more. From now on, all undercover law inforcement personnel are to wear uniforms, or at least display department badges during all undercover operations. The Florida "Ninja Turtle" case was quite similar to this one. The FBI paid those guys 50K to be terrorists. Were these men also paid? Were they terrorist fanatics, or were they common criminals recruited to "do a job?" Did they buy these "bombs" or were the bombs supllied to them? Where the F would these clowns get a hold of a stinger missle? You think they "bought" that as well? As if some street punks could buy more than a saturday night special? As I said, I'm not going to waste any tears over people ready to bomb holy sites, or shoot down a plane - But give me a break? Big terrorist case my azz. Dave Ever heard of the black market. You can get anything there. "A government big enough to give you everything you want, is strong enough to take everything you have." ~ Gerald Ford
